website_summaries.verdict: A patriotic spin on the classic look.
pros: Painted with a specially formulated, weather-resistant finish to withstand harsh elements
cons: Assembly instructions are not very clear

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The only thing I question is how long the gold parts will last. As they are more of a hard plastic material instead of the metal. Item was well packaged [little tricky to get out of package] Item went together well and looks perfect! **Fastening screws are not included!**
customer_reviews.author: DeterminedDIY

customer_reviews.title: Eagle Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The gold balls are plastic and it isn't totally straight. Brookstone needs to tell people that the bracket for the weathervane is included, so that you don't order one through another company and then have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: drphyllis

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks good from a distance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I broke the West-East bar when I over tightened the set screw, and the thin cast aluminum was hard to fix. I over tightened it when I was trying to get the four directions to be square and level, they naturally wanted to sit at an angle. I saw a review somewhere, that might not be this exact product, saying that the balls were plastic-- these are definitely metal. I didn't use mine, I thought it looked better without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Well made easy to put together, how ever no bolts or screws were supplyed
customer_reviews.author: ERIC PAPPALARDI

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to new garage
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very nice weathervane Its made of solid aluminum with a strong mounting bracket already attatched. with no need to buy anything else except some nice screws to mount it. I am very happy with it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Eagle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift for my husband, he did not know I had ordered it. I cannot remember seeing him so excited about anything for a long time. He had been looking for a weathervane for a long time and he loves eagles so this was the perfect gift. He could hardly wait to get it hung on his storage building that he had build a few months ago. Thanks for a Great looking weathervane, it was truly much more than even I had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelyne South

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful weathervane
customer_reviews.text: We mounted this on the peak of our new garage. It looks absolutely beautiful with the emerald green metal roof. It's well made and very affordable. This makes my wife happy and after 36 years, that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Roll Man

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Looks really good on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra1

customer_reviews.title: Thanks its awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time for me to finally find the one I was looking for and even longer to get it ordered but I finally did and it now completes my tile roof. Thanks its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Golden Eagle Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this weathervane I was a little skeptical as to the quality, but when I received it I was impressed with the high quality and very good workmanship .
customer_reviews.author: Nayef

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the roof and assembles and installs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Golden Eagle Weathervane Review
customer_reviews.text: Product was packaged very well and appears to be easy to assemble. There is no way anything can be missing as weathervane is packed in vacuum formed plastic. For the money I will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: The weathervane rocks - or in this case, it spins!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't put it up on the garage roof yet. We live in Northwestern Pennsylvania - and there's snow on the roof! But it's going to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J

customer_reviews.title: but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a fair wind to move it, but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The weater vane is just beautiful and included eveything to mount it. It will look great on top of the garage coupola.
customer_reviews.author: Justmw\e

customer_reviews.title: Golden Eagle Weather vane
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year,looks great on my cupola above the garage. Looks even better than I expected. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice weather vane. Easy it put up and looks great. Only 4 screws to bolt it on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery.Product was exactly as described. Easy to assemble. We are very pleased and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tc

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: sent as a gift they where happy looks good on there barn if i need one i would buy this one again
customer_reviews.author: shopper 17954

customer_reviews.title: Gregg L. Friedman MD, Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL
customer_reviews.text: The Whitehall Eagle Weather Vane is a beautiful addition to our roof. It is made of high quality aluminum and it has held up very well to the elements. I give it 5 stars. By Gregg L. Friedman MD, Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Weathervane by Whitehall Products
customer_reviews.text: I have bad experience with the 24inch weathervane manufactured by Whitehall Product. The item is apparently cheaply made and extrememly brittle and the parts are easily broken. I broke the mast and the N-S directional while installing it on a post outdoor by tightening the nut and screw that came with the kit. WIll not buy any Whitehall products again.
customer_reviews.author: Yung Ying Kit

product_meta.title: Whitehall Products Full-Bodied Eagle Weathervane, 30-Inch, Gold/Bronze
product_meta.description: The Whitehall Full-Bodied Traditional Directions Weathervanes add a 3-dimensional look to your weathervane. Our full-boded designs show the detail and craftsmanship of these items and are painted in a specially formulated, weather-resistant finish that will withstand harsh elements. these items are hand cast from 100% rust-free, recycled aluminum, and are made in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
